Module kivakit.service.client

Package com.telenav.kivakit.service.registry.client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ServiceRegistryClient
    A JSON + REST + JERSEY proxy to ServiceRegistry processes that register services on the local host and discover services by Scope: locally, on remote hosts, in clusters and on the network at large.
    ServiceRegistryClientSettings
    ServiceRegistryClient settings, including an ServiceRegistryClientSettings.accessTimeout(Duration) and the location of the executable server jar, provided with ServiceRegistryClientSettings.serverJar(Resourceful).
